name: Towards The Light (ASTO)
description:
You thought death was the end....but it was only the beginning.

Travel towards the light in this light platformer. Avoid ghost of previous sins that will try and push you off to your doom. Reach the light and you will be saved!

Follow us on www.astogames.com or:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/astogame

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/astogames/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC97sw8h-djUU3bIu4UjJC_Q
